author: kknb1056
body:
Fix to resolve a circular dependency as described here: https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/swReleases/3927.html

Moved TrackingParticleSelector.h from CommonTools/RecoAlgos to SimGeneral/TrackingAnalysis.  Should probably move CosmicTrackingParticleSelector.h, TrackingParticleSelector.cc and TrackingParticleRefSelector.cc to SimGeneral/TrackingAnalysis at some point in the future for consistency, but that will require switching namespaces and probably needs some discussion.  I was told this was an urgent fix for 6.2.x so created this pull request for just TrackingParticleSelector.h for now.
title: Move TrackingParticleSelector to SimGeneral/TrackingAnalysis
